title: Rebirth of the Elder Brother Do Not Panic - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Cultivation   Death of Loved Ones   Male Yandere   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: 迁衍
description: Wen Jiu was struck to death by a lighting and transmigrated to a stallion novel he had read before, he had the honor of becoming the second senior brother. In the story, the second elder brother is gentle, chic, and considerate. He loves his junior sister with all his heart, but was rejected tragically.>
